title: Daughter of Darkness
tags: journey to the house of grief
find a way into the cloister
content:
sation by bringing up that we managed to recruit an interesting wizard. Your journal records will periodically update as you continue to interaction Shadowheart. Your next set of choices will look like this:

What's the story with that odd little artefact you have? What do you think of all that's happened to us so far? We should get to know each other a little more. We should journey separately for now. I'll look for you here if I need you again. Leave.
